description: 在人工智能浪潮中，博士学位正在取代传统的MBA文凭，成为企业家最喜爱的新学历。
titleZh: PPT玩家被无情淘汰：美国AI创业圈，博士学位是新入场券
titleEn: Ruthless Elimination of PPT Players: In the US AI Startup Scene, a PhD is the New Entry Ticket
descriptionZh: 在人工智能浪潮中，博士学位正在取代传统的MBA文凭，成为企业家最喜爱的新学历。
descriptionEn: In the AI wave, a doctoral degree is becoming the new favorite credential for entrepreneurs, replacing the traditional MBA diploma. The myth of dropping out is increasingly becoming an exception, as today's technical elites, leveraging their research depth, lead small, efficient teams to rapid prominence.
